sen.j: 安富 才助（やすとみ さいすけ、天保10年（1839年） - 明治6年（1873年）5月28日）は、備中国足守藩出身の新選組隊士。
sen.e: Saisuke YASUTOMI (1839 - May 28, 1873) from Ashimori Domain of Bicchu Province is a member of the Shinsengumi (a special force that guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).

sen.e: After Hijikata died in the Hakodate War, Yasutomi, who was by Hijikata's beside when he died, wrote a notice of Hijikata's loss and asked Chikara TACHIKAWA to forward it to the Hijikata family.
